mission_statement: Expand human potential to do extraordinary work, enabling AI-centric employees to create AI-transformed businesses.

core_products.name: Glean Assistant
core_products.description: A personal AI assistant offering data analysis, deep research, canvas, and companion features to empower employees with instant access to company knowledge.

core_products.name: Glean Agents
core_products.description: A platform to build, manage, govern, and orchestrate AI agents, including an Agent Builder, Governance, Orchestration, and Library for automating workflows.

core_products.name: Glean Search
core_products.description: The foundational enterprise AI search connecting all company knowledge across various applications through an Enterprise Graph, Personal Graph, System of Context, and Hybrid Search for instant, relevant results.

core_products.name: Connectors & Actions
core_products.description: Provides 100+ out-of-the-box connectors to integrate with diverse enterprise applications (e.g., Slack, Jira, Salesforce, ServiceNow) and APIs for building custom generative AI experiences.

core_products.name: Glean Protect
core_products.description: Ensures safe and secure scaling of AI at work with security built-in from day one, offering flexible content controls and permissions-aware access.

core_products.name: Agentic Engine
core_products.description: Enables advanced AI capabilities to plan and adapt over company context, driving intelligent automation and decision-making.

target_markets.ideal_customer_profile: Large enterprises and organizations across various sectors seeking to enhance employee productivity, streamline operations, and drive innovation through AI-powered knowledge management and intelligent automation across departments like Engineering, Customer Service, Sales, Marketing, People, and IT.

sales_triggers.recent_news: No specific recent funding rounds mentioned in the provided data. News includes the 'AI Transformation 100' report, highlighting real-world AI transformations.
sales_triggers.strategic_priorities: Focus on enabling AI-centric employees, building and managing AI agents, safely scaling AI at work, and connecting all company knowledge to automate work and improve productivity.

impact_metrics.result: Saves up to 110 hours per user per year.
Saved new hires an average of 36 hours on onboarding.

green_flags: Offers a comprehensive Work AI Platform with AI Assistant, Agents, and Search capabilities, addressing multiple enterprise needs.
Features an extensive integration ecosystem with 100+ out-of-the-box connectors, ensuring broad compatibility with existing enterprise tools.
Strong emphasis on improving employee productivity and accelerating AI transformation across diverse industries and departments.
red_flags: Lack of explicit mention of specific security compliance certifications (e.g., SOC2, ISO 27001) beyond 'secure by design' and 'Glean Protect'.
No recent funding announcements or valuation details provided in the given data, which might require further investigation for financial stability and growth trajectory.
compliance_standards: Secure by design from day one
Glean Protect for safely scaling AI at work
